meanings.definition: To fill or overpower with terror; terrify.
meanings.sent1: The loud thunderstorm outside can terrorize my little dog.
meanings.sent2: The horror movie was so scary that it could terrorize even the bravest person.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten loves to terrorize the household by hiding people's socks.
meanings.sent4: The haunting memories of the war continue to terrorize his dreams.
meanings.sent5: The sinister villain's plan was to terrorize the entire city with his evil deeds.
